name: MiniUSB's Shader PvP Resource Pack
body:
### From swords to shaders.
This PvP texture pack not only increases the enjoyability and ease of PvP, but it makes your Minecraft look a whole lot better. Just because something is functional doesn't mean it has to look bad.

### Features
* Faithful items
* Lightweight shaders, NO shader mod required!
* Plast Pack GUI

### Credit

MiniUSB: Sword edits, texture mashups
Plastix: GUI from the Plast Pack
Wedhro: Amazing shaders creator
HiTeen & Vattic: Faithful texture pack items
Original shader pack [here](http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/552208-pixel-reality-v172-updated-to-162-new-lighting-effects/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
